job description:
Fermentation Scientist – Minneapolis, MN

Kelly Scientific Resources is currently seeking candidates for a Fermentation Scientist for one of our top clients in Minneapolis, MN. This is a Direct Hire position.

As a Fermentation Scientist placed with Kelly Scientific Resources, you will be responsible for performing fermentation process development activities from benchtop scale to pilot scale.

Responsibilities:
  • Perform fermentation process development activities from benchtop scale to pilot scale using Quality by Design approach.
  • Develop and troubleshoot commercial scale fermentation process
  • Operate bench scale bioreactor to qualify raw materials
  • Serve as technical resource for process development, evaluation and validation projects related to fermentation and downstream processing of manufactured pharmaceutical product
  • Perform critical analysis of process data, interpret results and draw scientific conclusions, present data at group meetings
  • Communicate results through appropriate documentation and batch records, write development reports, troubleshoot equipment and procedure failures.
Educational and Experience Requirements:
  • BA/BS in Microbiology or related life science with 5-8 years of bench and/or pilot scale fermentation process experience
  • Experience with method development/processes in FDA regulated environment
  • Strong lab skills and techniques
  • Familiarity with bioreactors/fermenters, process controls and cell enumeration techniques
